get(key:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.data.Map
retrieve a Map value
getAppLogin(email:String, password:String, corpId:String, productCode:String, version:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method validates the user/password/company/product/version combination and generates an appid token string to use later with getLicenseAppid() It dispatches a LicenseClientEvent of type LicenseClientEvent.LICENSE_RESPONSE with a req_type of NLMConstants.REQUEST_GETAPPLOGIN.
getAssociatedFactory(object:Object) — Static Method , class com.nitrolm.modules.spark.EncryptedModuleManager
See if the referenced object is associated with (or, in the managed ApplicationDomain of) a known IFlexModuleFactory implementation.
getCurrentSkinState() — method, class com.nitrolm.comp.Login
getCustomerProducts(corpId:String, email:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves products owned by a given company that a user has access to.
getCustomValue(productCode:String, version:String, varname:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves a custom license value.
getCustomValues(productCode:String, version:String, values:com.nitrolm.data:Map) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves all custom license values.
getExternalValues(productCode:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves the customer list and values (AID, etc.) that are in the license's pool and its children.
getKeys() — method, class com.nitrolm.data.Map
retrieve an array of all keys
getLicense(email:String, password:String, corpId:String, productCode:String, version:String, type:String, days:int, market_source:String, useQueue:Boolean) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves a license from the NitroLM server.
getLicenseAppid(appid:String, productCode:String, version:String, market_source:String, useQueue:Boolean) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method is useful for servers with downloadable software.
getLicenseDefault(email:String, password:String, corpId:String, productCode:String, version:String, market_source:String, useQueue:Boolean) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves the default license type for this product and default number of checkout days(if retrieving a checked out license).
getLicensedProducts() — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves a list of products that currently have licenses on this machine.
getLicenseInfo(productCode:String, licenseValues:com.nitrolm.data:Map) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves license info values from the currently active license such as when the license will expire.
getManualLicense(productCode:String, version:String, market_source:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method generates a key for this machine to use on the Manual License Request website.
getMessages(email:String, version:String, days:int) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves server messages for a given user.
getModule(url:String) — Static Method , class com.nitrolm.modules.spark.EncryptedModuleManager
Get the IModuleInfo interface associated with a particular URL.
getProxy() — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
Get the current HTTP proxy settings.
getSessionData(version:String, appid:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves session data.
getUserVar(productCode:String, varname:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method retrieves a user variable from the server.
getValues() — method, class com.nitrolm.data.Map
retrieve an array of all values
